Features include a regal oval shaped case with intricately designed front and back etchings, precision Swiss date movement, white dial with silver-tone Arabic numerals, silver-tone classic hands, scratch resistant mineral crystal and a matching 15" curb chain with spring ring attachment. In addition, the back cover of this timepiece opens into a stand so that you can display you watch on your desk or nightstand. We also include a bonus solid brass desktop stand that will showcase your pocket watch for all to see. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged with operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your timepiece clean.
